jobs.title: Senior Architect
jobs.description: We are looking for an experienced Senior Architect to lead design projects for industrial and commercial facilities. The ideal candidate will have strong design skills and experience in industrial architecture.
requirements: B.Arch with minimum 8 years of experience
Experience in industrial and commercial architecture
Proficiency in AutoCAD, Revit, and 3D modeling software
Strong understanding of building codes and regulations
Excellent communication and team leadership skills
responsibilities: Lead architectural design for industrial and commercial projects
Coordinate with structural and MEP teams
Prepare design presentations and client communications
Mentor junior architects and interns
Ensure design compliance with applicable codes

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Seeking an experienced Project Manager to oversee execution of industrial construction projects. The role involves coordinating multiple stakeholders and ensuring project success.
requirements: B.E./B.Tech Civil with minimum 10 years of experience
Proven track record in industrial project management
Strong knowledge of construction processes and quality standards
Experience with project management tools and methodologies
Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities
responsibilities: Manage project planning, scheduling, and resource allocation
Coordinate contractors and ensure quality standards
Monitor project progress and report to stakeholders
Manage project budgets and ensure cost control
Handle project documentation and compliance

jobs.title: Structural Engineer
jobs.description: Looking for a Structural Engineer with experience in industrial buildings and PEB structures to join our engineering team.
requirements: B.E./B.Tech Civil or Structural Engineering
5+ years experience in structural design
Proficiency in STAAD Pro, ETABS, or similar software
Experience with PEB and conventional structures
Knowledge of relevant IS codes and standards
responsibilities: Design structural systems for industrial buildings
Prepare structural calculations and drawings
Coordinate with architects and other engineers
Review contractor submittals and shop drawings
Conduct site inspections as required

jobs.title: Interior Designer
jobs.description: We are seeking a creative Interior Designer with experience in corporate office interiors to join our design team.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Interior Design
4+ years experience in commercial/corporate interiors
Proficiency in AutoCAD, SketchUp, and visualization software
Strong understanding of materials and finishes
Portfolio demonstrating design excellence
responsibilities: Develop interior design concepts for corporate spaces
Create space plans, material boards, and 3D visualizations
Coordinate with architects and MEP consultants
Manage interior fitout execution
Liaise with vendors and procurement
